titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: OTHER BENEFITS RECEIPT INDICATOR (IMPROVING ACCESS TO PSYCHOLOGICAL THERAPIES) - Description

div.p: OTHER BENEFITS RECEIPT INDICATOR (IMPROVING ACCESS TO PSYCHOLOGICAL THERAPIES) is the same as attribute BENEFIT RECEIPT INDICATOR FOR IMPROVING ACCESS TO PSYCHOLOGICAL THERAPIES Â to indicate if the PATIENT is in receipt of any other benefits other than Jobseeker's Allowance, Employment and Support Allowance, Universal Credit or Personal Independence Payment.
